programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: A massive fire caused by illegal garbage smuggling has triggered a radiation crisis in Hong Kong. Government advisor Simon joins the crisis response team led by Acting Chief Executive to avert the disaster. A fire brigade is tasked to enter the radiation zone and stop the cesium fallout. Facing the unprecedented catastrophe, can they save the city?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhangs custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Happy New Year!!
programme.desc: Business tycoon Duan is kidnapped and seriously injured by the "Shadow Empire", accidentally losing his memory. Duan is looked after by Su, a temple owner, and as he slowly recovers, Duan discovers that he has been replaced by a doppelgnger, prompting him to uncover a shocking hidden secret.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husbands love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2009
programme.desc: Successful businesswoman Yu Chu has no chance of finding a husband with her insufferable personality, much to the consternation of her younger brother Yu Bo, who due to a curse, will fail in love until his sister gets married. Yu Bo hires a love expert, Dick, to woo his sister. Smitten at first sight, Yu Chu is not about to let Dick get away...

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu's until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: Yang Guo and Xiao Long Nu are deeply in love and live harmoniously in the ancient tomb. Xiao Long Nu proposes marriage one day but Yang Guo declines. Heartbroken, she leaves without a word. Devastated by her absence, Yang Guo searches tirelessly for her. When they finally reunite, he begs her to marry himonly for her to refuse his proposal.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and you've got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain, and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and you've got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: The Cave Of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother's Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: House Of Traps
programme.desc: An evil prince has hidden the stolen imperial treasures in a house filled with booby-trapped blades. Amid plasma-spurting attacks, heroes and rogues try to uncover the deadly secrets of the house...

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls' high school, is stuck with a baby that isn't his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Pursuit Of A Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards' heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army's help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang's father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father's death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma S1 Ep89
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Hagola S1 Ep8
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.title: World's Greatest Train Journeys: Japan's New Golden Route S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Paul explores the remote, thatched villages of Gokayama, through Niigata's rice paddies on a special sake train, to the washi paper mills of Echizen, and the ancient, spiritual waters of Lake Biwa.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep19
programme.desc: 50 million Big Hunks of peanutty nougat are produced every year; watch potato pellets become Smart Fries in just two minutes flat; and see how one million gummy bears are produced every hour.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep20
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines of food factories, including pretzel nuggets, French fried onions and Italian Brio soda.

programme.title: Changing Planet: Coral Special S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Changing Planet: Coral Special will embark on the third year of this 7-year project examining the issues facing the planet's most threatened ecosystems.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Danube: Europe's Mightiest River S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Slovakia and Hungary - Joanna discovers that the "blue Danube" is both a constant reminder of Europe's unchanging beauty, its past triumphs and current threats - and the thread that keeps it powerfully connected.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S11 Ep10
programme.desc: Utah - Ben visits Scott Brodie in Utah, who has built an off-grid life in the Canyonlands, and the episode explores Scott's resilience and the "prepper" mindset.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep4
programme.desc: Off the Deep End - Alaskans rediscover old practises to get through the heart of winter.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Indonesia - Life in the Muck - Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. In this mucky ecosystem, predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race developing unlikely techniques of attack and defense.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart S
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Turtle Beach S
programme.desc: Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Pirate Birds - Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Place in the Wild - Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenyas rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack Vs. Pride S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Manzi the Superpack - Return to the Kakumbi as they mourn two pups, encounter a hyena den, witness lions hunt buffalo, and see the Manzi face a leopard and angry elephants.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey's heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the ocean's vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn's final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean's top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean's top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey's heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the ocean's vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn's final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S8 Ep5
programme.desc: Series 8, Episode 5 - The sewers follow the pattern for a toddler's sailor suit, make fancy dress Halloween outfits and create out-of-school garments from old school uniforms.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 1 - In Eastbourne, Emma and Nick come to the rescue of Becca, Sam and their four children who are swamped by clutter. Fortunately, interior designer Alex Dauley is on hand with some clever solutions.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S9 Ep10
programme.desc: Series 9, Episode 10 - It's Dessert Day and the second heat of bakers are sent into a spin with a crpe roll in the Technical and, in the Showstopper, the bakers must produce a meringue tart.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Paul attends a quinceaera birthday party in Baja California, tries fresh cactus in Milpa Alta and insects in Oaxaca, and visits one of Mexico's best restaurants on the Yucatn Peninsula.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep12
programme.desc: Dollhouse Store Day - When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnips Music Store!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedians disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces its time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes shes got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep3

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep18

Gabby consoles him and tells him its even better now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep66

The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep11
programme.desc: Shock and Awww - Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along theyre so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep9
programme.desc: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 1 - Its Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep10
programme.desc: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 2 - Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year and hes also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nians cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but theyre no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everests magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep6
programme.desc: Fault Ripper - Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when its revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and DAngelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;hes forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep5
programme.desc: Parental Stridence - When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep724

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Monkey Bay, Thailand - Glitch's plans to open a hotel on an unspoilt beach in Thailand go horribly wrong when a group of macaque monkeys steal his Grim-o-freeze gun.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hammerbarn - On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Dance Mode - After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Andy and the Painted Dog Pups - Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Mission: Carrots - It's puppy cadet training day, when pups all over Woofton see if they've got what it takes to become an assistance dog.

programme.title: Aneeshwar And Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Lion and Sloth - Aneeshwar and Lizzie head out to meet lions. From their safari truck, they get right in amongst the pride and see big maned males as well as a large group of females. Their next animal is Rico, a two-toed sloth.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep25
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed's Super Snippets - Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments, their super snippets, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Pizza Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep14
programme.desc: The Train Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep13
programme.desc: The Dancing Bug Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Everglades National Park, Florida - The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitch's picnic.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep7
programme.desc: The Other Big Engine - While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas Meets Gustavo, another big blue engine who reminds him of Gordon back home.

programme.title: Sarah And Duck S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Star Renovation - Venus has attempted to redecorate the night sky, but now Sarah can't find any of her favourite constellations...

programme.title: Sarah And Duck S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Woolly Memories - Scarf Lady's old film reels get themselves in a tangle, so Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Holiday - Seamus has booked the wrong date for his and Little Woo's holiday. Stanley repurposes the locations of the town into activities and sights to give them a holiday in a day.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Dig - Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden that turn out to be old bits of mosaic. With the help of Cynthia and Hettie, they put the pieces back together.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep72
programme.desc: My Family - Monty is teased by a school friend for having a strange family and begins to wish the Kazoops were more like everyone else.

programme.title: Jojo & Gran Gran S3 Ep21
programme.desc: It's Time to Eat Green Banana and Saltfish - JoJo wants to bake banana loaf for Jared, who's coming to dinner, but the bananas are too green. It's time for a Gran Gran plan - what can they make with green bananas?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep37
programme.desc: The Decider - The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Fairy Tale - Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Musical Statues - At the end of a long day, Bluey and her family are out of sync and out of sorts, so Mum gets everyone to play musical statues.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Monkey Bay, Thailand - Glitch's plans to open a hotel on an unspoilt beach in Thailand go horribly wrong when a group of macaque monkeys steal his Grim-o-freeze gun.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Banana - Banana reveals another secret about herself in the opera piece, "I've Got a Secret".

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Cabbage - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the marvellous Cabbage.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Super Birthday - Supertato is delighted when Evil Pea comes to his birthday party but Carrot is suspicious. Soon Evil Pea unleashes the Mini Peas who try to steal Supertato's birthday present.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Winter Wonderland - Evil Pea thinks the Veggies won't like it when she covers the Supermarket in ice, but instead they have the best snow day ever, so she creates a giant snowball to ruin their fun.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep61
programme.desc: Close the Gate - The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies' gate open and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Octopus - Dee encourages a friend to say 'octopus' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a giant octopus, a tiny octopus, a swimming octopus and a gardening octopus!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Zip's Movie - As everyone else gets their films ready for a big movie night, Zip still doesn't know what his film should be about. He wonders whether he will have a film to show at movie night after all.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Muscly Messy - At the OKIDO Oki-lympics, everyone is joining in! A race between Messy with his super muscles and Zam with his amazing new robot pants results in some surprises.

programme.title: Razor

RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. programme.title: Kapsul Malaysia Petang Ini
programme.desc: Kapsul Malaysia Petang Ini memaparkan sorotan terbaik daripada program temubual harian Malaysia Petang Ini, menampilkan topik terkini, informatif dan relevan. programme.desc: The third-annual Noche UFC event has landed at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, on September 14, and fight fans in the Lone Star State will be treated to one of the most highly antcipated bouts of 2025 when featherweight contenders Diego Lopes and Jean Silva clash in the five-round main event. Fighting out of his adopted home of Puebla, Mexico, Lopes owns wins over Brian Ortega and Dan Ige, and following his five-round war with Alexander Volkanovski, hes eager to return against The Fighting Nerds Silva, a supreme finisher who has ended all five of his UFC victories before the final horn.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Ulberg vs. Reyes - Prelims
programme.desc: The UFCs return to Perth on September 28 will feature one of the most explosive members of the Anzac contingent, as New Zealands top light heavyweight contender, Carlos Ulberg attempts to make his case for a world title shot when he faces American standout Dominick Reyes. Winner of eight in a row with five finishes, Ulberg is peaking at the right time after back-to-back wins over Volkan Oezdemir and Jan Blachowicz, and now he has his sights set on ending the winning streak of Reyes, who has knocked out his last three opponents en route to this showdown at RAC Arena
